title: Tower Assist Bug
body:
Does anyone attack a tower multiple times but still never get an assist because it's taken by a minion?

Is Riot aware of this so that it stops happening at some point? 

I usually don't mind but now it's starting to annoy me when you specifically push a tower looking for the assist gold.

replies.body: Fairly sure that taking a tower gives global gold anyway, so shouldn't matter hugely.
You get global gold for a tower and you also get assist gold.
